entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
